messages.title: Sarah Carr's fight to end 'outrageous' hospital parking charges.
ANGER GROWS AT THE BANKS
messages.content: Local businesses struggle as bankers award themselves huge bonuses

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Sarah Carr can beat the Conservative ex-banker here

issues.economy: Local businesses struggle as bankers award themselves huge bonuses
issues.health: Sarah Carr's fight to end 'outrageous' hospital parking charges.

leaflet.personalStatement: Local campaigner Sarah Carr said, 'It's a sickening sight to see the banks handing out six and seven-figure bonuses while the rest of us struggle to pay our bills.'

images.caption: Sarah Carr with supporters campaigning against hospital parking charges
Local business owners expressing concern over bank bonuses

leaflet.additionalNotes: Conservative and Labour supporters switch to back Sarah Carr. LABOUR HAVE FAILED BRITAIN'S ARMED FORCES
